mapper.insert: INSERT INTO collection (collection.commodity_id, collection.consumer_phone, collection.start_date) VALUES (#{collection.commodityId}, #{collection.consumerPhone}, NOW())
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM collection WHERE collection.commodity_id = #{collection.commodityId} AND collection.consumer_phone = #{collection.consumerPhone}
mapper.select: SELECT commodity_id FROM collection WHERE consumer_phone = #{phone} ORDER BY collection.start_date DESC LIMIT 0, 10
